snippet: Alex Rovt, a native of Ukraine, purchased the office tower at 14 Wall Street for $303 million, in cash, without a broker.
abstract: Fertilizer tycoon Alex Rovt purchased the office tower at 14 Wall Street for $303 million, in cash, without a broker; all-cash purchases of large office towers are rare in New York City, but the strategy is not unusual for Rovt, who prefers not to borrow more than he has to and likes how cash transactions allow him to close deals more quickly.
lead_paragraph: Alex Rovt, a native of Ukraine, purchased the office tower at 14 Wall Street for $303 million, in cash, without a broker.

headline.seo: Alex Rovt Buys 14 Wall Street for $303 Million
headline.main: Fertilizer Billionaire Buys Buildings His Way, in Cash
headline.print_headline: Fertilizer Billionaire Buys Buildings His Way, in Cash
